name: Depression (MrSlitherGamer_YT)
description:
Heyllo there player! You are a simple circle in the mind! And you MUST stop your person from getting depression! This was made for the GameDev Hideout #1,  and relates to the theme of Black and White in a few ways:

1. It's mostly black and white (because I couldn't find any nice colors)

2. You want to see light, not darkness, the darkness is depression, since they only see the world badly, and the light is happiness!

CONTROLS -

W - up

A - left

S - down

D - right

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

The more depression squares you kill, the more points you earn! But if 15 depression cubes are on the screen at 1 time... You got depression!
